scripts.create-s3-bucket: aws s3 mb s3://dummy-alive-company-set-up --region us-east-1 --profile alive-dev-komal
scripts.sam:package: sam package --template template.yaml --output-template-file cloudformation.yaml --s3-bucket dummy-alive-company-set-up --region us-east-1 --profile alive-dev-komal
scripts.sam:deploy: sam deploy --template-file cloudformation.yaml --stack-name dummytest --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --region us-east-1 --profile alive-dev-komal
